title: Absurd interaction with Zed
body: So Zed shadow clones have Zed ítems, and if Zed has a Guardian Angel, all his shadows revive once when you killed them, so you can end the figth battling Zed and three Shadows… this is stupid, for gods sake, why is this interaction allowed?

replies.body: If you have enough damage Zed can't get enough mana to clone, even with GA.
